original: Berg, Sven Axel Gunnar, redaktionschef, Karlskrona, f. 31/3/05 i Karlskrona av riksdagsm. Rob. B. o. Evelyn Svensson. G. 30 m. Marie-Louise Nordvall. Barn: Astrid f. 35. — Stud. v. Brunnsviks folkhögsk. 23-24 o. 24-25, v. nord. folkhögsk. i Genève 35. Kont:anst. 20-26, medarb. i S^^döstra Sv:es Dagblad sed. 28, red:-chef där sed. 44. Led. av styr. f. riksb. avd:kont. i Karlskrona sed. 45, ordf. i ABF lo<kalavd. 32-42, sekr. 25-31, fd. sekr. o. ordf. i SDUK m. m. Medl. av Pubhkl., Sv. journal :fören., Sv. tidn :utg:fören., SAP o. SSU.
translated: Berg, Sven Axel Gunnar, editor-in-chief, Karlskrona, b. 31/3/05 in Karlskrona to Member of Parliament Rob. B. and Evelyn Svensson. Married in 1930 to Marie-Louise Nordvall. Children: Astrid b. 1935. - Studied at Brunnsviks Folk High School in 1923-24 and 1924-25, at the Nordic Folk High School in Geneva in 1935. Employed in an office from 1920-26, collaborating in Sodöstra Sverige's Dagblad since 1928, editor-in-chief there since 1944. Member of the board for the state's department office in Karlskrona since 1945, chairman of ABF local department from 1932-42, secretary from 1925-31, former secretary and chairman of SDUK, etc. Member of the Publicist Club, Swedish Journalist Association, Swedish Newspaper Association, Social Democratic Party and the Swedish Social Democratic Youth League.
